question: Ankita Raina, who was making news recently, is associated with which sports?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s star Tennis player Ankita Raina won her maiden WTA title along with her Russian partner Kamilla Rakhimova.
The duo clinched the doubles event in the Phillip Island Trophy in Melbourne. With this win, the 28-year-old Ankita can reach top-100 in the WTA rankings in doubles. She will be the second Indian woman player to be in top-100 after Sania Mirza.
